Hi guys,

Do you have any idea how to config the heritrix to meet the following
requriements:

I'm using heritrix-1.14.4, my main goal is to download all the
websites not the documents.

1. crawl any urls that is not any file type in:
(js|jpg|css|txt|pdf|exe|EXE|mis|bmp|gif|jpe?g|png|tiff?|mid|mp2|mp3|mp4|wav|avi|mov|mpeg|ram|rm|smil|wmv|doc|pdf|ppt|swf|...)

2. not duplicate crawling the same domain

3. write into the arc document only when the url is a domain format. e.g:
    write http://www.archive.com or http://sub.archive.com
    not http://www.archive.com/archives/page1.html and any file types

Thanks for any reply.
